mapper.select: select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname , u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productraw_price t left outer join productrawinfo s on t.pid = s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu=u.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and s.status=0

select t.*, s.id as sid,s.code as scode,s.name as sname , u.id as uid,u.name as uname from productraw_price t left outer join productrawinfo s on t.pid = s.id left outer join unit u on s.gu=u.id where t.status=0 and s.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and s.status=0
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}
